title: A Good Counter To Yasuo
body:
Yasuo is a champion I always have a hard time laning against (in midlane), thanks to his mobility, free shield and super-two-item-spike-power! I'm never particularly annoyed with him or think he's incredibly OP or anything. I've just never been able to effectively counter him in lane - he always goes even or better in lane than me.

Guess I'm asking you guys - how do you deal with Yasuo? What champions do well against him in your experience? Or do I just need to get gud 'cause he's actually really easy to deal with? ;)

Second there are couple of rules

1. Dont fight yasuo when his windwall is up (Atleast dont wast everything in windwall)
2. Dont fight yasuo when his shield is up (Bait it out with 1 aa)
3. Dont fight yasuo when his 3rd tornado is up
4. Dont fight yasuo when there are lots of minions around
5. Dont fight yasuo when his e is stacked up
6. Contantly aa your own minions to hold the wave in the middle if you dont feel like you can get them under tower
